WorkItem.Description: Works in vs2010, fails in vs2012 (only creates .min. version). Workaround is to create a FileGroup where Minify="true" AND a FileGroup where Minify="false" - however, that workaround FAILS in vs2010 (only creates the first one).   Therefore, "side-by-side" use of Chirpy is currently broken.
WorkItem.Summary: Minify="both" only creates .min. version in VS2012
